title: Olive Oil Dip
introduction: Pinzimonio is a delightful Italian appetizer that consists of fresh vegetables paired with high-quality extra-virgin olive oil. This simple yet flavorful dip allows the natural taste of the vegetables to shine through, accented by the richness of the olive oil and a touch of salt and pepper. It's a testament to Italian culinary philosophy, valuing fresh ingredients and straightforward preparation.

ingredients.item: Fine sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
Assorted raw vegetables cut into strips, such as carrots, celery, green onions, peppers, zucchini, and radishes

instructions.description: Divide the olive oil among four small cups.
Each diner should add salt and pepper to taste.
